metadata.title: CVE-2024-40725 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A partial fix forÂ  CVE-2024-39884 in the core of Apache HTTP Server 2.4.61ignores some use of the legacy content-type based configuration ofhandlers. "AddType" and similar configuration, under some circumstanceswhere files are requested indirectly, result in source code disclosure oflocal content. For example, PHP scripts may be served instead ofinterpreted.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.4.62, which fixes this issue.

criterions.comment: apache2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
